meta_description: Founded in 1931, the Vancouver Art Gallery is recognized as one of North America’s most innovative visual arts institutions.
hours_text:
## Where To Find Us

Vancouver Art Gallery  
750 Hornby Street  
Vancouver, BC V6Z 2H7

## Gallery Hours

—

### Save Time.  
Book Online.

[Book Tickets](https://tickets.vanartgallery.bc.ca/)

### Get More Access to More Art.

[Become a Member](https://www.vanartgallery.bc.ca/membership/)

### Ticket Prices

Gallery Members

FREE

Indigenous Peoples

(for those who self identify at the Admissions Desk)

FREE

Annual Access Pass

(12 months of unlimited access)

$58

General Admission

(Non-BC Residents)

$35

General Admission

(BC Residents)

$29

Youth

(age 13-18)

FREE

Child

(age 12 and under)

FREE

Admission is FREE on the first Friday of every month from 4 to 8 PM during Free First Friday Nights presented by BMO.

Reserve a spot in advance to guarantee entry into the Gallery.

The Gallery is cashless. Please purchase your ticket online or pay by card, including debit or credit. Apple Pay, Google Pay and Discover Card are not accepted at this time.

*Select coupons and discounts cannot be claimed online. Please visit the Admissions Desk upon arrival to redeem.

### Group Prices (10 or more)

Gallery Members

FREE

General Admission

$25

Youth

(age 13-18)

FREE

Child

(age 12 and under)

FREE

Caregiver

(attendant to persons with disabilities)

FREE

*Visiting the Gallery with 10 or more people? Book as a group and save! [Find out more »](https://www.vanartgallery.bc.ca/visit/#group-bookings)
